snippet: "It maun be on the Fairy Knowe, there's nae doot aboot that!" he said with immense earnestness of manner, marking the site and ground-plan on the back of a receipt for dock dues with the remains of a stubby pencil, the light twinkling all the time in his small grey eyes, sunk deep in the puckers of forty years among the salt sea winds.
